channel.title: User Interface on Aenism
channel.description: Recent content in User Interface on Aenism

item.title: Multi-type navigation bar symbols in Sketch
item.description: Here’s a way to multiple types of navigation bars using a single symbol in Sketch app. It saves me lots of time and should do the same for you. I have three symbols. The back button and status bar symbols are standard. The important one is the navigation bar symbol. Look at the layer list and you will see I have included various labels for left and right items, done item and two types of titles/subtitle.
